body.text:
Do the following steps to add a new account
Step 1: Open Outlook
Step 2: Click file >> Add account
Step 3: Enter the Mail id and password.
Step 4: Account will be configured.
Step 5: Click on done.
body.id: Do the following steps to add a new account Step 1: Open Outlook Step 2: Click file >> Add account Step 3: Enter the Mail id and password. Step 4: Account will be configured. Step 5: Click on done.
